Title: Predator
Overview: A team of elite commandos on a secret mission in a Central American jungle come to find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.
Keywords: central and south america, predator, alien, stalking, invisible, commando, 3d
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Lawrence Gordon Productions, Davis Entertainment, Silver Pictures, Amercent Films, American Entertainment Partners L.P.
Cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Elpidia Carrillo
